summary:
These are converted resources from Phitts Oblivion mod Sheogorad - Forsaken Isles ALPHA, a remake of the Morrowind region Sheogorad in the North of Vvardenfell
This part includes the Dagon Fel resources
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ff0000][size=3][b]None of these resources or parts of them may be used in paid mods[/b][/size][/color]

=========================
Phitt's Sheogorad Resource - Part Two

Modder's Resource
=========================

By Phitt

Converted by Tamira

=========================

These are converted resources from Phitt's Oblivion mod "Sheogorad - Forsaken Isles ALPHA", a remake of the Morrowind region Sheogorad in the North of Vvardenfell
This part includes the Dagon Fel resources

You can find the original files here:
http://www.nexusmods.com/oblivion/mods/37329/?


Part One is available here: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59632/?

=========================

Phitt gave me permission to convert and upload the resources that are included in his great mod.
There is a huge amount of resources so I decided to split it in several parts.

I had to leave out all meshes that are based on vanilla Oblivion meshes so there are not all objects from the Oblivion mod included in this one.

The remaining parts (Daedric, Dwemer, Velothi) will be uploaded by someone else. A mod-team contacted me and told me that they already converted them some time ago.
They promised me to upload their converted resources as soon as they have released the trailer for their mod.

=========================

Objects that are included in Part two:

5 different shacks with interiors
dock kit
ship (no interior)

2 different awnings
5 different overhangs

Cyrodiil type buildings:
The tower and the nordhouse have interiors
For the other two buildings there is an interior kit to build your own interior

Clutter:
hammocks, static and as furniture
baskets, static and movable
chandelier with candles
fishing net and herrings
tapestries and a rug
4 different tables
2 different stools (furniture)
shelf
Morrowind style lanterns and lantern hangings
(More lanterns, static and movable are available here: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59977/?)

=========================

Read the included "Original Sheogorad Terms Of Use" and give credits as requested there
Read the included "Original Sheogorad Readme" to get an impression where all this comes from.

=========================
Tools Used:
=========================

Nifskope
NifUtils by Skyfox
Gimp

=================
Permissions:
=================

This is a modders resource.You may use the files for your own mods as long as you give credit to the authors and you do not charge money for it.
Please link back to this resource when you use it in your mod.

You may use this resource in Skyrim Special Edition too. All files should work without problems.

Do not upload to other sites.

=================
Credits:
=================

Phitt - Models/Textures

The Niftools team for giving us Nifskope.
Skyfox from the Niftools team for his great tool NifUtils
CG Textures
author: Phitt and Tamira
